meanings.definition: The art of making or manipulating puppets.
meanings.sent1: She learned about puppetry in art class.
meanings.sent2: The puppetry show was entertaining for the children.
meanings.sent3: The puppetry workshop was full of creativity and fun.
meanings.sent4: Her puppetry skills were like magic on stage.
meanings.sent5: The intricate puppetry techniques amazed the audience.

meanings.definition: The performance or skill of puppetry.
meanings.sent1: His puppetry during the play was outstanding.
meanings.sent2: They practiced puppetry for weeks before the show.
meanings.sent3: The puppetry competition brought out the best in everyone.
meanings.sent4: The puppetry performance left a lasting impression on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The art of puppetry requires dedication and practice.

meanings.definition: The use of puppets in a theatrical production.
meanings.sent1: The puppetry in the play added a magical touch.
meanings.sent2: They incorporated puppetry into the musical seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The puppetry in the comedy play had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The puppetry on Broadway was a visual feast for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The creative puppetry brought the characters to life on stage.
